titles: The two first books of Philostratus, concerning the life of Apollonius Tyaneus written originally in Greek, and now published in English : together with philological notes upon each chapter / by Charles Blount, Gent.
Life of Apollonius of Tyana. Book 1-2. English
author: Philostratus, the Athenian, 2nd/3rd cent.
Blount, Charles, 1654-1693.
notes: Page 132 is stained in filmed copy. Pages 120-145 photographed from Harvard University Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
